Boolean private

model

Object

Defined in addon/components/tt-calendar-month-event.js:66

An event model/object. Should be an Ember Object with two properties. An event property that is the event model. And a week property that is the week that this event is being displayed on.

Ember.Object.create({ event: model, week: Ember.Object.create({ start: startOfWeek, end: endOfWeek }) });

The week object has 2 properties. start is the start of the week, end is the end of the week.
